comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
I think the title should be Lady Constance Leslie?  (It's right in the detailed caption.) I'm looking at PRONI's own introduction to the Leslie Papers... This is Lady Constance Leslie (1836-1925).  I love this description of her by an inlaw, on page 53:

"One thing is that everyone who knows her must see the impossibility of getting on with her, so I do not feel myself to blame.  They make themselves more unhappy than they do other people."  (in a letter by Julia Leslie)

She certainly looks the part!

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Thank you! The title has been amended.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
